      public void identificationProcess​(java.lang.String login)
      Process the identification if the client is not already connected. Send an error if the opCode is not the identification code else it send an acceptance packet.
      Parameters:
      opCode -
      pck -

    • updateInterestOps

      public void updateInterestOps()
      Update the interestOps of the key looking only at values of the boolean closed and of both ByteBuffers. The convention is that both buffers are in write-mode before the call to updateInterestOps and after the call. Also it is assumed that process has been be called just before updateInterestOps.
      Specified by:
      updateInterestOps in interface Context

    • silentlyClose

      Specified by:
      silentlyClose in interface Context
